Title: Prohibits the recording of conveyances suspected of being fraudulent
Summary: Prohibits the recording of conveyances suspected of being fraudulent; requires the clerk or registrar to report transactions believed to be or suspected of being fraudulent to the office of the attorney general and to local law enforcement or sheriff's office.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting the recording of conveyances suspected to be fraudulent
